lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we jump into tonight's game, we do have some announcements to get through, beginning with our first of two sponsors, Cortex. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super interactive! All you need is dice, a cup, hot water, and a thirst for excitement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is, until Rooibos the Red attacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) (laughter) I guess, I guess while we're waiting, what do you guys think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, it was really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Until then, back to you, Matt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks to Cortex for sponsoring the show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the rest of the announcements, we have a few things to go through. First, beginning with Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The most important one: This is our last episode of the year.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. And we'll be returning for episode 121 on Thursday, January 14th, is our next episode back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I take it off the hanger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'll keep it on the hanger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our Critical Role Cobalt Soul varsity jacket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, what?! Now you can be a Expositor in real life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is amazing, and it's available right now in our US, UK, and Australian shops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we have, I'm nervous because I'm so excited about these things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So first off we have our Mighty Nein-- don't pull-- don't do anything yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have our Mighty Nein, "This Is How We Roll" fine art print by the incredible Ian MacDonald, which is available for pre-order right this moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, does it come with the matting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's how it comes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So gorgeous. I'll put this on my wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can pre-order our first two collectible figures, Fjord and Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you go first, you go first!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, bring it in Marisha, bring it in more so you can see them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check out side.show/criticalrole to RSVP to be notified of pre-order launches.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you just say side dot show slash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For years and years and years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can zap a man's eye out with that Fjord sword there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys. Ah, it's so cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Matt. Quick update by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Just roll up some new characters and we'll try a campaign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it, it's the entire thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, that bit is in my Top 50 of your bits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is high? That's medium praise! That's medium praise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's lot to come back to the new year with!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the last one of the year, we got to get it all in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kick it off better than last year.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just love these so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I mean, look at them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm jealous that they're the first two figures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to see them side by side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to see them fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll post pictures on socials and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So dope. The detail is killer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So last we left off: The Mighty Nein, making their way through Eiselcross with the eventual destination plan of reaching the ruins, the central ruins of Aeor, which currently is to the east across a volcanic river of magma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's gonna be one of those games.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: down the stairways into this blue-lit, familiar chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wanted to do this at the end of the last game, and just stop Yasha, because we're in the back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oddly, it's not because of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's-- you make me nervous, in a good way-- I've got cotton mouth-- in a good way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought I really fucked up and I just was like, was it too much? No, I just--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You did read it. I thought maybe you didn't read it yet or maybe you did, and you just were like, I don't want to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like we had the yetis, and then we had Dagen, and then we just kept bringing in weird people into the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to, like, go on a date or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I never like do anything the right way, and so I figured that maybe with this, I should just go like start from the beginning, and we haven't really had a beg- We had like a beginning and then we had like, like a, "You stabbed me" thing, and then, and then now we need like a second beginning.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would love that more than anything.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I just thought that, you know, when, when, when, when like, you start acting weird or stupid around someone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then you're just like, why can't I just act normal?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I think, it's-- I like you, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of asked Caleb if we could, like, change the tower, you know? Because we're kind of in like a weird situation where I don't think there's bars, but I've got some ideas, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh... (stammering) Tomorrow night? Is that too soon? Should we wait till the weekend? What day is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're all standing right next to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you guys went ahead and I stopped her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to you all in a second.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If-- If we live, let's go on a date tomorrow night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, we'll see. If we're still in here, we'll figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll, as we're trekking through the tundra and saving the universe, we'll make plans.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then if we go on the date and you're, like, not into it anymore, that's okay too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, no-- I don't want to make it weird, you know? Because we're like, working together.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was not expecting that, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wanted to ask you earlier, but it just kind of, just-- I'm sweating.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Me, too. I get really squirrely.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But you look great. It's like-- you have a very nice dew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go steal an ancient relic.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like move my hips a little bit more,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you strut your way behind your compatriot--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, what are we doing? Are we all figured-- you know, we got to figure it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we thought that you guys were talking strategy. It seemed like an intense conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a str- It's a strategy of a different kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what did you guys come up with?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were gone for a while, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The plan is to stay alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had a much more intricate, like, thing before we went into the last one of these places, it was like, you wanted to talk and be allies and all sorts of stuff. This is just, stay alive?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lucien's not here and now it's just get the job done, right? And just, like, make it, and just live in the moment, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are oddly sweating in this cold place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you look like my dad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were farting back there, weren't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's limited oxygen down here, I didn't want to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So she held me back just to stay with her in the, well, she had tummy issues.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's that crayon smell. It's very overpowering.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some people just can't smell farts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's just, it's-- It's a weird thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you got to drop a bomb, Yasha is your wingman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a lot of fallen rubble in here and you can see there are a couple of heavy stacks or piles of rock, stone, and other structural materials that have fallen. But overall, the room is holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I know this looks very much like the last one, but let's not take it for granted, and start looking around for any threats in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any sort of inlaid statues or things that could come to life, or traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I go full on poke about with an investigation, or is that too involved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, like, spend the time rummaging through stuff, sure, make an investigation check, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is-- where is investigation? It is in 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Okay. So it'll take you a little while, so while you're doing that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somewhat frosted, it seems like, from the inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm, maybe someone should scan it for magic first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we close enough in for Detect Magic to...?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'll do a Detect Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you were investigating and looking around the area, the two orbs in the sides, they just briefly flash and then go back to a dull sensation. You sense a brief flash of magical energy, and then they just go inert.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was something. There's nothing now, but that was something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's why I'm trying to pull you back in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're still thinking about Beau and Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should be careful. This seems--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this whole room is just lit up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have to cross between the two orbs in order to get to the Threshold Crest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to around them, I'm not going to walk between them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do see an armored hand that is loosely visible near one of the piles of stone on the far left hand corner of this room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can see from here, is that weird? Is it magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not appear to emit a magical aura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a hand, or at least just a glove. I don't know, is there anything in it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I'll come over and I'll cast my magic hand and just try to, sort of, tug on it from 30 feet away and see if it moves or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it lifts with it, like it's being lifted from its place, but is attached.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'll come closer and investigate to see if it's trapped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and check and see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever it's attached to is currently under quite a bit of stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get no undead essence in the vicinity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Divine Sense for celestial and fiend?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, we are being super careful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we are being so careful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott, do you want me to come-- do we want to unbury this thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need help to dig it out?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll try to-- yeah, do we want to look at this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's maybe about-- I'd say a little bit shorter than Caduceus and has the proportions of a human, but it looks like it's crafted from enchanted metals, and stone, and other weird rubbery materials, similar to the cables that you saw torn through some of the chambers and walls on your way in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does his face look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can see there are sockets where eyes would be, and an area where a mouth would be that looks like it has some sort of a joint to it, like a jaw, but it is partially crushed inward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we leave this buried? It's going to come to life and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to kneel down and start seeing if there is any sort of power source, the likes of which I've read about and which I've been hoping for, ever since the Folding Halls of Halas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an arcana check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see within the armor, there are grooves and runes, so there was some sort of enchantment, though it appears to be bereft of any sort of life or source.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any language on it? I still have Comprehend Languages up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no language written on it, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out the collar that got thrown around my neck and say: I'm looking for something to bring this back to life, and I think if we are lucky somewhere here, I might.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The orbs haven't flashed again, have they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you get close to them, do they flash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to walk close to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How close was-- was it Caleb who was-- is anybody close to it before when it flashed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you were all moving in, but it was Caleb who was the first to go in and begin, like, looking through and searching the local rubble and such.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or I could do it. You don't-- you know, just maybe not you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone with-- Can you still teleport? Can you still jump?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This place is giving me feels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It went away! I'll get within 20 feet of the orbs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at the crystal in the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you step closer, still nothing, no reaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the heck, man. How close was Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was about, maybe, 15 to 10 feet from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, how are we going to get this crest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody could fly up and we could--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did we see when we walked into the last one of these? How were they getting it down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've seen me pulverize gems, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just keep an eye out, and stay as far away from it as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we just try to dispel it, you know, just make it inert.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think we have that much magic, do we? This thing's huge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'd take a really high level, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better to save that for getting out of here, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we don't want to make it inert, right? I mean, we want to remove it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why wouldn't we want to make it inert?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because then it's not a bargaining chip anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but why would we bargain with them? What would we bargain for it? You know what I mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. We won't know until we get to that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we keep it not broken, then they have the opportunity to use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if we break it, then they can just say, "Oh, well, I'll go get another one, then."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm afraid that it's going to be hard to leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just think if we get it out, we use a lot of power doing it, they happen upon us, we're already weakened, they take it from us, and then we did the work for them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The guy that we've met when we entered this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should have fucking wiped his memory, so he didn't remember seeing us, because if people come down, they're going to be like, "Where are you're friends?" And he's going to be like, "They went that way." Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We told him that bad people might be coming and to hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Said he was going to hide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And they can watch us any time they like, they probably know we're--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah? Are they watching us now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like I use it rather frivolously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, and I think I've used it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you've already used it today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because we've used a lot of spells already today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is precisely why we shouldn't try and destroy it here. We should destroy it once we're--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get it out first. Let's get it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably going to need more than we have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We probably want to wait to catch it, unless we want to see if it smashes when it hits the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Let's just try to get it smashed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just sort of (sucking sound) hollow out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's see if these columns react to magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe in the door. I'm going to stand in the doorway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whatever happened there, the worst already happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lightning doesn't strike the same place twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Fabricate, just is less of a shape as it is and more of taking raw materials and then building them into an actual constructed object.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I could, it's up to you, but if I can take pieces of wood and make them "Vroop!", couldn't I do the reverse and go "Vroop!" and just make the shape a wider, bubbled--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, come up with a-- Currently, the spell requires a final visualized structure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So all the stone around it will drip down and make like a thin spider web of stone that will either catch it or smash through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, do we want to catch it? Because I could catch it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got 10 minutes to think about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I can cast Levitate then and catch it, if you want me to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we could just see if it smash--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we could try to break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the one that doesn't want to break it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, currently I'm going to put it in, like, a little bit of a stone net, which should be easy to break, one of us to break it if we want, in a quick hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're all focusing on this, you hear this very, very faint--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get in front of Caleb. So he can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch as through the opening, as you all found your space to hide within the interior, you are at the moment-- you're on probably no more than 30 seconds into the spell before--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, have to bail on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its body is somewhat cracked open, on the inside you can see these cables that are (electrical wire sparking) sparking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to make a perception check real fast on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Real bad, I think that's a six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is why nervous, because we're all going to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This chamber's surprised by-- I mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go check out their amazing stuff at dwarvenforge.com or right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're way bigger than I envisioned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you placed in this Chamber, everybody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm crouching behind the robit. Where's the robit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm on the stairs to your left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're couching behind it over, here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha and Caleb would have been near the center of the room, and the moment we saw that thing, Caleb would have taken a step left, so he is directly behind Yasha, hiding from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Yasha, you'd be about there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see where my thing is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you paint symbols on the floor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see where my thingy is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the backside, ba-- You can't see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm doing the same thing on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed, and where did you invoke it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I invoked duplicity right next to the stairway in the middle. Yeah, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The symbols are glowing on the floor, they pulse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They are pulsing right now! Look at that! Look, look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt, that is a little large.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should have used the new Fjord figurine to be like-- (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does he only have one one arm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is very aware of your presence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck, I just thought we'd have a little bit more time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hate going first and I rolled a 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a stock market for initiative?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- to go first. Otherwise, he's gonna whack you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. Are you serious?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. This is not (laughs) a surprise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who has the higher dex between you two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up first. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean out from behind Yasha and take the cat mint from inside my coat and go (foomph) and a spectral Frumpkin floats and the Cat's Ire claw is right above that glowing circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will use it to shred and hit the automaton.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going after it. We're getting it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it rushes over to meet it to strike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a melee spell attack, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does an automaton count as a creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just its type is a construct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will back up to the opposite wall from it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With a slightly shell-shocked face, I just go: Hey, go, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All righty. Jester, you're up next.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to have her cast Banishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I legitimately rolled a 19 and a 20, for reasons. It still fails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might have a low charisma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It vanishes from the space here for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A 20 isn't an automatic success for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long has it gone for? A minute?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he's got a negative three charisma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not like there's a critical success on a save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just gives us a time limit, is all, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We have a minute until he comes back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we can get and run.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to get that thing in a minute?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't. It takes him 10 minutes to cast his spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just try and cut it the hell out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could try to smash the shit out of it instead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and I could go to the roof, right? Or, well.

lines.name: MARISHA
